Lines.Description: If 'camera_x' LessThan 'Player_X / XRes * XRes' ELSE GOTO 00000744
If 'camera_x' GreaterThan 'Player_X / XRes * XRes' ELSE GOTO 00000822
If 'camera_y' LessThan 'Player_y / yres * yres' ELSE GOTO 00000904
If 'camera_y' GreaterThan 'Player_y / yres * yres' ELSE GOTO 00000986
Print ' Sean F' to bottom panel
Print ' Erik H' to bottom panel
